resources.string:
This app is designed for demonstration purpose and is not meant for commercial use. 
This app is designed for training purpose. 
Objectives: 
 - learn NavigationUI(menu, Up button, Drawer, Navigation Graph, Slide Animation and Safe Args) 
 - learn ViewModel architecture 
 - create ViewModel using ViewModelFactory 
 - implement Observer Pattern 
 - data binding between ViewModel and layout.xml 
 - data binding using binding adapter 
 - implement recycler view (Grid layout) 
 - implement recycler view (Linear layout) 
 - implement DiffUtil 
 - add header and footer to recycler view 
 - use Retrofit library to connect to internet 
 - use Glide library to download images 
 - create backend Flower Shop database with REST API 
 - use alarm manager to schedule notifications 
 - display notification when there is an item in cart for long time

- tap icon to navigate to item details 
 - tap "+" button to add item to cart 
 - tap cart icon to navigate to cart 
 - once in cart, tab bin icon to remove item from cart 
 - tab buy icon to place an order 
 - in drawer menu tap My Orders to see historic orders 
 - in drawer tap Reset to undo all changes
